meanings.definition: To summarize or condense something into a concise form.
meanings.sent1: She did a great job capsulizing the main points of the story.
meanings.sent2: I need to start capsulizing my notes for the exam.
meanings.sent3: By capsulizing the recipe, she made it easier to follow.
meanings.sent4: His speech was like capsulizing a novel into a short story.
meanings.sent5: Capsulizing the information will help us remember it better.

meanings.definition: To encapsulate or enclose something in a capsule or similar container.
meanings.sent1: The scientist is capsulizing the medicine for easy consumption.
meanings.sent2: Please make sure you are capsulizing the correct dosage.
meanings.sent3: He enjoys capsulizing his favorite snacks for on-the-go convenience.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him felt like capsulizing a piece of her heart.
meanings.sent5: Capsulizing the fragile item will protect it during shipping.
